text: Decorative painting transforms ordinary surfaces into extraordinary works of visual texture, depth, and illusion. Each finish captures the artist’s balance of technique, color, and light.
Explore Dana Elza’s studio practice through projects that range from historical restorations to contemporary works on canvas.

title: Artworks & Restoration
description: Browse galleries showcasing Black & White, the Drip Series, Encaustic, and more — each series revealing a unique exploration of surface, gesture, and material.
